definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached

sentences.english: A silicon gel, which has greater specific pore volume and stronger polarity, is the optimal adsorbent.
sentences.chinese: 硅胶是拥有大比孔容的强极性吸附剂，吸附效果较佳。

sentences.english: The absorption methods of purine compounds in beer by several kinds of absorbents had been developed.
sentences.chinese: 建立了几种吸附剂对啤酒中嘌呤类物质吸附的方法。

sentences.english: The arsenic-containing industrial wastewater treated with fly ash as adsorbent has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了以粉煤灰为吸附剂处理含砷工业废水。

sentences.english: Prepared adsorbents, copper-containing alumina, are effective in adsorbing mercaptan in kerosene.
sentences.chinese: 利用油乳法制备了含铜氧化铝吸附剂。

sentences.english: Experimental Study on the Treatment of Wastewater Containing Arsenic by Polysilicate-metal Salts;
sentences.chinese: 研究了以粉煤灰为吸附剂处理含砷工业废水。

sentences.english: It is shown that the improved coal ash adsorbent can obviously heighten the absorptivity of ions.
sentences.chinese: 证明粉煤灰吸附剂显著提高了对水中离子的吸附性。

sentences.english: All of these provide us with a fire-new clue to new type porous sorbent design.
sentences.chinese: 为新型的多孔吸附剂的设计与制备提供了一种新思路。

sentences.english: Facet's FIWA absorptive cartridges perform two jobs with one cartridge.
sentences.chinese: FIWA吸附剂过滤筒可以用一个过滤筒做两项工作。

sentences.english: Development of new adsorbents is an important subject in research of adsorption technology.
sentences.chinese: 新型吸附剂的研制是吸附工艺研究的一个重要课题。

sentences.english: The solid on whose surface adsorption occurs is called the adsorbent.
sentences.chinese: 在表面上发生吸附作用的固体叫吸附剂。

sentences.english: Several processes and highly effective adsorbents for the recovery of ethylene from FCC dry gases are described.
sentences.chinese: 概述了回收干气中乙烯的几种工艺技术和高效吸附剂。

sentences.english: Adsorbent is an important method in water treatment technology.
sentences.chinese: 吸附剂是水处理技术的一种重要手段。

sentences.english: Further developments of absorbents for producting N2 used for air separation are also prospected.
sentences.chinese: 展望了空分制氮吸附剂的进一步发展。

sentences.english: Ti -modified silica gel monolithic adsorbent was prepared by impregnation-deposition method.
sentences.chinese: 采用浸渍沉积法制得钛改性硅胶块体吸附剂。

sentences.english: Preparation condition of sorbent has obvious influence on the desulfuration property.
sentences.chinese: 吸附剂本身制备条件对脱硫性能影响明显。

sentences.english: The filtration technology with adsorbent precoat for waste magnetic suspending liquid is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 主要介绍了废磁悬液吸附剂预涂膜过滤技术工艺。

definition: to de-absorb/to get a chemical out of solution
